TheFadedTBCap,"2011-02-26T14:06:17.25Z","Best Video Game Ever!","

This game is amazing!
column2: It goes over all the four movies and fixed some of the old game's problems.&nbsp
column7: Six of these boxes lead to to worlds one for each movie (the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull is split into three parts), and the other two are million stud worlds (were you try to collect a million studs) and the creator box.&nbsp
column8: In the creator box you can build you own levels and minifigures and save them to use later.&nbsp
column10: also build your own adventure by mixing in different levels and use quick play to get to a level fast.&nbsp
column11: All the movie worlds consist of a certain pattern of levels which are adventure, fighting the enemies, car crash, collecting certain items, and the big battle at the end.&nbsp
column12: Sadly, it cuts out some of the good parts of the movies and they added some new problems.
